author: Rai Furniss-Greasley
description:
Off the coast of Texas lies the semi-submerged wreck of the Christabel, sunk in 1900 and now resting on the seabed in the Gulf. Over the years without human interference a mangrove forest has grown up through the heart of the old freighter and now Charlie Book and team have set up a small research […]

The post REVIEW: The Night Birds by Christopher Golden appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: The Night Birds by Christopher Golden
